### TNO Laws
### Economic Laws
### Automatically generated by Yard1's CSV to Ideas generator, originally for TNO
ideas = {

	tno_trade_laws = {
		law = yes
		tno_trade_laws_free_trade = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_trade_laws_free_trade"}
			default = yes
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				min_export = 0.7
				production_speed_buildings_factor = 0.15
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.15
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.15
				research_speed_factor = 0.075
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_trade_laws_export_focus = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_trade_laws_export_focus"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				min_export = 0.5
				production_speed_buildings_factor = 0.1
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.1
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.1
				research_speed_factor = 0.05
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_trade_laws_limited_exports = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_trade_laws_limited_exports"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				min_export = 0.25
				production_speed_buildings_factor = 0.05
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.05
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.05
				research_speed_factor = 0.025
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
   				factor = 1

   				modifier = {
					factor = 0

					is_major = no
					is_in_faction = yes
					has_war = yes
				}

				# minors not at war should want to get the bonuses from free trade
				modifier = {
					factor = 0

					is_major = no
					has_war = no
				}
   			}
		}
		tno_trade_laws_closed_economy = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_trade_laws_closed_economy"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				min_export = 0
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
   				factor = 1

   				modifier = {
					factor = 0

					is_major = no
					is_in_faction = yes
					has_war = yes
				}

				# minors not at war should want to get the bonuses from free trade
				modifier = {
					factor = 0

					is_major = no
					has_war = no
				}
   			}
		}
	}
	tno_economic_focus = {
		law = yes
		tno_economic_focus_demilitarized_economy = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_demilitarized_economy"}
			default = yes
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				consumer_goods_factor = -0.05
				production_speed_arms_factory_factor = -1.50
				production_speed_industrial_complex_factor = 0.30
				industrial_capacity_factory = -0.25
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = -0.25
				production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = -0.40
				political_power_gain = 0.15
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		tno_economic_focus_civilian_economy = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_civilian_economy"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				production_speed_arms_factory_factor = -0.50
				production_speed_industrial_complex_factor = 0.15
				industrial_capacity_factory = -0.20
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = -0.20
				production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = -0.20
				political_power_gain = 0.05
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_economic_focus_early_mobilization = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_early_mobilization"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				production_speed_arms_factory_factor = -0.15
				industrial_capacity_factory = -0.05
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = -0.05
				production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = -0.05
				political_power_gain = -0.05
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 1.8

				modifier = {
					factor = 20

					is_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
		tno_economic_focus_partial_mobilization = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_partial_mobilization"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.05
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.05
				production_speed_industrial_complex_factor = -0.25
				political_power_gain = -0.15
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 2

				modifier = {
					factor = 20

					is_major = yes
				}
			}
		}
		tno_economic_focus_war_economy = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_war_economy"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				consumer_goods_factor = 0.05
				production_speed_arms_factory_factor = 0.30
				production_speed_industrial_complex_factor = -0.40
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.10
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.10
				production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = 0.05
				political_power_gain = -0.25
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 5

				modifier = {
					#High prio on production
					factor = 20
					manpower_per_military_factory >  1000
				}
			}
		}
		tno_economic_focus_total_mobilization = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_economic_focus_total_mobilization"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				consumer_goods_factor = 0.10
				production_speed_arms_factory_factor = 0.50
				production_speed_industrial_complex_factor = -0.50
				industrial_capacity_factory = 0.20
				industrial_capacity_dockyard = 0.20
				production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = 0.10
				political_power_gain = -0.50
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 1

				modifier = {
					factor = 25
					#Prio this if nation has a lot of manpower compared to MIC
					manpower_per_military_factory >  10000
				}

				modifier = {
					#Block  unless nation has a lot of manpower
					factor = 0
					manpower_per_military_factory <  3000
				}

			}
		}
	}

		law = yes
		tno_minimum_wage_no_minimum_wage = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_minimum_wage_no_minimum_wage"}

	tno_child_labor = {
		law = yes
		tno_child_labor_legal = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_child_labor_legal"}
			default = yes
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				taxable_population_modifier = 0.04
				production_speed_buildings_factor = 0.05
				stability_factor = -0.10
				research_speed_factor = -0.10
				MONTHLY_POPULATION = -0.20
				industrial_capacity_factory	= 0.10
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_child_labor_restricted = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_child_labor_restricted"}

			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_pensions_trinket_pensions"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.02
				stability_factor = -0.025
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_pensions_low_pensions = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_pensions_low_pensions"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = { 
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.04
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_pensions_acceptable_pensions = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_pensions_acceptable_pensions"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.06
				stability_factor = 0.025
				poverty_monthly_rate = 0.75
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_pensions_good_pensions = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_pensions_good_pensions"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.08
				stability_factor = 0.075
				poverty_monthly_rate = 1.25
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
	}
	tno_unemployment = {
		law = yes
		tno_unemployment_no_subsidies = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_unemployment_no_subsidies"}
			default = yes
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				stability_factor = -0.075
				poverty_monthly_rate = -0.25
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_unemployment_trinket_subsidies = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_unemployment_trinket_subsidies"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.03
				stability_factor = -0.025	
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_unemployment_low_subsidies = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_unemployment_low_subsidies"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = { 
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.06
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_unemployment_generous_subsidies = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_unemployment_generous_subsidies"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.09
				stability_factor = 0.025
				poverty_monthly_rate = 0.5
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
		tno_unemployment_basic_income = {
			on_add = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: add idea tno_unemployment_basic_income"}
			available = { always = no } #TODO CHANGEME
			
			removal_cost = -1
			ledger = civilian
			modifier = {
				proportional_gdp_cost = 0.15
				stability_factor = 0.075
				poverty_monthly_rate = 1
			}
			cancel_if_invalid = no
			ai_will_do = { } #TODO CHANGEME
		}
	}
}
